verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: The same day] [ARG1: the Trump administration] [V: was] [ARG2: able to secure the release of three American hostages from North Korea in the run - up to the historic summit] , CBS foreign correspondent Elizabeth Palmer was in the capital of Iran claiming the people felt like hostages of the same Trump administration . At the same time , she failed to mention Iran was actually holding several Americans
